info.name: Khang Dien House Trading and Investment Joint Stock Company
info.description: Khang Dien House Trading and Investment Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate development in Vietnam. It is involved in the leasing; real estate trading and auction; receiving land use rights to construct houses for sale and lease; investing in the construction of infrastructure; architectural activities and related technical consultancy activities; brokerage; preschool and primary education; civil and industrial construction works; and the provision of real estate management and consultancy services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
